title: NutriTracker.ai
summary: AI-powered full-stack nutrition tracking app with YOLO food recognition, personalized calorie goals, and comprehensive health metrics.

details.fullDescription: A comprehensive full-stack web application that helps users track their nutrition, calculate personalized calorie goals, and analyze meals using AI-powered food recognition. Features include JWT authentication, smart onboarding with BMI/BMR/TDEE calculations, and an admin panel for user management.

architecture.name: Frontend (HTML/CSS/JS)
architecture.description: Mobile-first responsive UI with dark mode support and green theme (#2E7D32)

architecture.name: FastAPI Backend
architecture.description: RESTful API with JWT authentication, password hashing (bcrypt), and modular router architecture

architecture.name: SQLAlchemy ORM
architecture.description: Database models for Users, Profiles, Meals with SQLite storage

architecture.name: YOLOv8 Detection
architecture.description: Object detection model for identifying food items in meal photos

architecture.name: Hugging Face Models
architecture.description: NLP transformers for nutritional analysis and calorie estimation

architecture.name: Gmail SMTP
architecture.description: Password recovery with 6-digit verification codes

schema.name: Users
schema.description: UUID, full_name, email, password_hash, is_active, timestamps

schema.name: UserProfiles
schema.description: goal, gender, age, height_cm, weight_kg, activity_level, BMI, calories

schema.name: FoodItems
schema.description: name, category, calories_per_100g, protein, carbs, fat

features: üìß Password recovery via Gmail SMTP with 6-digit codes
üìä Smart onboarding: BMI, BMR (Mifflin-St Jeor), TDEE calculations
üéØ Goal-based calorie adjustment (¬±500 kcal for loss/gain)
ü§ñ YOLO object detection for real-time food recognition
üß† Hugging Face models for nutritional analysis
üë®‚Äçüíº Admin panel with user management, search, and pagination
üåô Dark mode toggle with persistent preference

calculations.bmi: weight (kg) / height (m)¬≤ ‚Äî Categories: Underweight (<18.5), Normal (18.5-24.9), Overweight (25-29.9), Obese (‚â•30)
calculations.tdee: BMR √ó Activity Multiplier (1.2 Sedentary ‚Üí 1.9 Extra Active)

projectStructure: backend/ ‚Üí main.py, database.py, auth.py, onboarding.py, profile.py

title: AI Book Management System
summary: Web-based system managing 10,000+ book records with ML-powered natural language understanding and PDF summarization.

details.fullDescription: A comprehensive book management system that leverages machine learning and transformer models from Hugging Face for natural language understanding. Features include intelligent search, automated categorization, and a PDF summarizer that reduces review time by 40%.

architecture.name: React Frontend
architecture.description: Modern UI with search, filters, and book management interface

architecture.name: Node.js API
architecture.description: RESTful backend handling CRUD operations and file uploads

architecture.name: MongoDB Database
architecture.description: Flexible document storage for 10,000+ book records

architecture.name: Hugging Face Models
architecture.description: Transformers for NLU, text classification, and summarization

architecture.name: PDF Processing
architecture.description: Extract and summarize content from uploaded PDFs

schema.name: Books
schema.description: title, author, ISBN, category, description, pdf_url

features: üìö Manage 10,000+ book records with efficient pagination
üîç Intelligent search with NLU-powered query understanding
ü§ñ Automatic book categorization using ML classifiers
üìÑ PDF upload and automatic content extraction
‚úÇÔ∏è AI summarizer reducing review time by 40%

title: Customer Churn Prediction
summary: ML model analyzing 50,000+ records to predict customer churn with 10% higher accuracy, enabling 15% better retention.

details.fullDescription: A Python-based machine learning solution that analyzes customer behavior patterns across 50,000+ records to predict churn with significantly higher accuracy than baseline models. The insights enabled a 15% improvement in customer retention strategies.

architecture.name: Data Collection
architecture.description: Aggregate 50,000+ customer records from multiple sources

architecture.name: Data Preprocessing
architecture.description: Pandas for cleaning, feature engineering, and transformation

architecture.name: Exploratory Analysis
architecture.description: Statistical analysis and visualization of churn patterns

architecture.name: Model Training
architecture.description: Scikit-learn classifiers (Random Forest, XGBoost, Logistic Regression)

architecture.name: Model Evaluation
architecture.description: Cross-validation, ROC-AUC, precision-recall analysis

architecture.name: Deployment
architecture.description: Model serialization and prediction API

schema.name: Predictions
schema.description: Churn probability scores and risk tiers

features: üî¨ Feature importance analysis for actionable insights

title: Gems e-Commerce (MERN)
summary: Full-stack MERN e-commerce platform with AI-driven recommendations and satellite image classification.

details.fullDescription: A comprehensive e-commerce website built using the MERN stack, featuring product rendering, AI-driven personalized product recommendations, and satellite image classification. Deployed on MongoDB Atlas for scalable, production-ready solutions.

architecture.name: React Frontend
architecture.description: Dynamic product catalog with responsive design

architecture.name: Express API
architecture.description: RESTful endpoints for products, cart, orders

architecture.name: Node.js Server
architecture.description: Business logic and authentication

architecture.name: MongoDB Atlas
architecture.description: Cloud database for products, users, orders

architecture.name: AI Engine
architecture.description: Recommendation system and image classification

schema.name: Products
schema.description: Gem catalog with images, prices, categories

features: üõçÔ∏è Full product catalog with search and filters

title: Python e-Commerce Platform
summary: Dynamic e-commerce platform with FastAPI, user authentication, product management, and Razorpay integration.

details.fullDescription: A full-featured e-commerce platform built with FastAPI and Python, featuring secure user authentication, comprehensive product management, and payment integration using Razorpay test mode. Deployed on Render for real-time functionality.

architecture.name: FastAPI Backend
architecture.description: High-performance async API framework

architecture.name: Jinja2 Templates
architecture.description: Server-side rendered product pages

architecture.name: SQLite Database
architecture.description: Lightweight persistent storage

architecture.name: Razorpay Integration
architecture.description: Secure payment processing

architecture.name: Render Deployment
architecture.description: Cloud hosting with auto-scaling

title: IoT Lighting System (Lytiva)
summary: MQTT-based Python integration for Lytiva lighting systems, enabling real-time control of 50+ zones.

details.fullDescription: A comprehensive IoT solution developed at Chipbucket Solutions for Lytiva lighting systems. Built Python-based MQTT integration enabling real-time control of 50+ zones, with RESTful APIs supporting 1000+ device interactions monthly.

architecture.name: Angular Frontend
architecture.description: Device configuration dashboard

architecture.name: NestJS API
architecture.description: RESTful endpoints for device management

architecture.name: MQTT Broker
architecture.description: Real-time message routing

architecture.name: Python MQTT Client
architecture.description: Zone control and automation

architecture.name: AWS EC2 + RDS
architecture.description: Cloud infrastructure with MySQL

title: Ahmedabad Bus Tracker
summary: Real-time, crowd-sourced bus arrival tracking platform with live map visualization for Ahmedabad city buses.

details.fullDescription: A prototype platform designed for real-time, crowd-sourced bus arrival tracking with live map visualization. Users can report bus locations and view real-time updates on an interactive map, helping commuters track bus arrivals more accurately.

architecture.name: Frontend
architecture.description: Interactive map interface using Leaflet.js and OpenStreetMap

architecture.name: Backend API
architecture.description: Node.js and Express for RESTful API and WebSocket server

architecture.name: Database
architecture.description: MongoDB for storing bus routes, stops, and user reports

architecture.name: Real-time Updates
architecture.description: WebSocket-based communication for instant bus location updates

architecture.name: Map Visualization
architecture.description: Live markers showing bus positions and routes on the map

features: üó∫Ô∏è Interactive map with live bus location tracking
üë• Crowd-sourced bus arrival reports from users
üìç Bus route and stop visualization on map
üöå Support for multiple bus routes and stops

title: AI-Powered PDF Interaction Platform
summary: Web application enabling users to upload PDFs, chat with their content, and generate AI-based summaries for improved document comprehension.

details.fullDescription: A web application that enables users to upload PDFs, chat with their content, and generate AI-based summaries. Uses Hugging Face Transformers (BART for summarization, DistilBERT for Q&A) to provide instant AI-driven insights, improving document comprehension and research efficiency.

architecture.name: React Frontend
architecture.description: Modern UI for PDF upload, chat interface, and summary display

architecture.name: FastAPI Backend
architecture.description: RESTful API for PDF processing and AI model integration

architecture.name: PDF Processing
architecture.description: PyPDF2 for extracting text content from uploaded PDFs

architecture.name: AI Models
architecture.description: BART for summarization, DistilBERT for question answering

architecture.name: Database
architecture.description: SQLite with SQLAlchemy ORM for storing documents and conversations

features: üí¨ Interactive Q&A with document content using DistilBERT
üì± Responsive design for mobile and desktop
‚ö° Quick processing with efficient PDF parsing
üíæ Persistent storage of documents and conversations
